entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
